XenotypeDef.label: Spirit-Bound Lich
XenotypeDef.description: Spirit-Bound Liches are created by binding the soul to a dead body in a manner similar, but exclusive to, resurrection magic. Spirit-Bound Liches must always thus be created. The soul effectively "haunts" the body, in a fashion not unlike how haunted structures function, granting the Spirit-Bound Lich significantly greater abilities than a merely animated skeleton.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A self-willed skeleton created by necromantic magic.

XenotypeDef.label: Animated Skeleton
XenotypeDef.description: Skeletons created by Animate Dead spells are little more than negative energy-powered constructs.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A mindless skeleton created by necromantic magic.
